alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 6:12PM AKST until December 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and strong winds occuring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Power lines could be damaged and trees blown over. Additional snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches are expected. West winds gusting 20 to 35 mph expected through this afternoon. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Now through 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds should diminish by late afternoon, with light snow continuing into Thursday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
